com.camerontec.catalys.util.dictionary

Interface IMessageInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageInfo

    public interface IMessageInfo
    This is a definition for messages. Messages are made up of fields and field groups with some requirement (e.g. required, optional, or conditional).
    Author:
    Wes Hallman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the list of alternative names.

      Get the message name.
      String getMsgType()
      Get the message type.
      String[] getRequiredFields()
      Get the list of required fields.
      int[] getRequiredFieldsAsInts()
      Get the list of required fields as integers.
